welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chisinau, Moldova! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant city known for its rich history, delicious wine, and stunning architecture. Enjoy your time here and explore all that Chisinau has to offer!

restaurants.name: New York Restaurant & Bar
restaurants.description: New York Restaurant & Bar is a american restaurant located in Chișinău.
restaurants.address: Str. Mitropolit Varlaam, 77 (Radisson Blu Leogrand Hotel), 2012 Chișinău

restaurants.name: Nobil Restaurant
restaurants.description: Nobil Restaurant is a modern european restaurant located in Chișinău.
restaurants.address: Str. Mihai Eminescu, 49/1 (Nobil Luxury Boutique Hotel), 2012 Chișinău

restaurants.name: Sincer Café
restaurants.description: Sincer Café is a café located in Chișinău.

restaurants.name: La Plăcinte
restaurants.description: La Plăcinte is a romanian restaurant located in Chișinău.

restaurants.name: Black Rabbit Gastro-Burrow
restaurants.description: Black Rabbit Gastro-Burrow is a modern european restaurant located in Chișinău.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Chisinau Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
